product_name: REI Brr Down Jacket - Toddler Boys'
long_description: The REI Brr down jacket offers grown-up warmth, comfort and performance for your little guy's first adventures into a winter wonderland. 650-fill duck down ensures warmth, light weight and compressibility; lightweight, recycled ripstop shell features quilt stitching to help keep down from shifting. Durable Water Repellent-treated down and shell fabric fend off moisture to help maintain loft and warmth. Full-length stormflap covers the zipper to block wind and snow; chin guard helps protect sensitive skin from abrasion. Hand pockets feature snap-down flaps and warm little fingers with cozy brushed tricot lining. Three-panel hood; elastic binding at neck, cuffs and hem; chest pocket with snap-down closure.
short_description: The REI Brr down jacket offers grown-up warmth, comfort and performance for your little guy's first adventures into a winter wonderland.
